adjective.description: Relating to or characteristic of the Spanish region of Catalonia, its people, or its language.

noun.description: A native or inhabitant of the Spanish region of Catalonia.
examples: he is bilingual like many Catalonians

noun.description: The language of the Spanish region of Catalonia, also widely spoken in Andorra, the Balearic Islands, and parts of southern France; Catalan.
